Cookie Consent Manager
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
Required Cookies
These cookies are required to use this website and can't be turned off.
Show More Details
Required Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
SAP as service provider
We use the following session cookies, which are all required to enable the website to function:
"route" is used for session stickiness
"careerSiteCompanyId" is used to send the request to the correct data center
"JSESSIONID" is placed on the visitor's device during the session so the server can identify the visitor
"Load balancer cookie" (actual cookie name may vary)  prevents a visitor from bouncing from one instance to another
Advertising Cookies
These cookies serve ads that are relevant to your interests. You may freely choose to accept or decline these cookies at any time. Note that certain functionality that these third parties make available may be impacted if you do not accept these cookies.
Show More Details
Advertising Cookies
Provider
Description
Enabled
Google Analytics
Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.
Cookie Information
Privacy Policy
Terms and Conditions
Confirm My Choices
Accept All Cookies

Bahia Vista Estates
Premier 55+ Active Living in Sarasota, Florida
Welcome home to Bahia Vista Estates for active 55+ living in the Sunshine State. Situated in Sarasota, one of the most beautiful cities in Florida, our age-qualified community offers stunning homes, friendly neighbors, fun activities, and resort-style amenities for vibrant retirement living on the west coast of Florida.
Meet friends at the clubhouse for social events, activities, and games. Try your hand at shuffleboard, or practice your swing at one of our lovely local golf courses. Dive onto the sparkling swimming pool, try aqua aerobics, or relax poolside. Surrounded by the cultural sights of Sarasota and the natural beauty of Florida's Gulf Coast region, Bahia Vista Estates is Sarasota's premier community with everything you need for an enjoyable life in the Sunshine State.
Read More
View Homes
about Premier 55+ Active Living in Sarasota, Florida
Premier 55+ Active Living in Sarasota, Florida
Bahia Vista Estates
Amenities and Activities
Experience a carefree lifestyle at Bahia Vista Estates. Socialize with neighbors and stay fit with fun recreational activities. Play billiards in the spacious clubhouse, swim laps in our crystal-clear pool, or start a game on the pickleball courts.

Bahia Vista Estates
Discover
Bahia Vista Estates is located in Sarasota - one of the most beautiful cities on the west coast of Florida. Our community offers easy access to exciting educational, entertainment and cultural attractions in the coastal Florida region. Get cultured at the Ringling Museum of Art, or explore aquatic lifeforms at the Mote Marine Laboratory. See a show at the Van Wenzel Performing Arts Center and play in the sunshine at Lido Beach, Siesta Key Beach, and Ringling Bridge Causeway Park. Explore nearby attractions  shopping, dining, and the arts. There is something for everybody in Sarasota.
Things to Do
Airports
Lido Beach
Siesta Key Beach
St. Armand's Circle
Van Wenzel Performing Arts Center
Ringling Bridge Causeway Park
Sarasota–Bradenton International Airport (SRQ)
St. Pete–Clearwater International Airport (PIE)
Punta Gorda Airport (PGD)
Tampa International Airport (TPA)

Bahia Vista Estates
Contact Us
FAQ Contact Us
Is Sarasota, Florida, a good place to live?
Is Sarasota, Florida, a good place to live?
Nestled south of Tampa on Florida’s Gulf Coast, Sarasota has a distinct vibe that's different from Florida's relative coastal cities, with its own vibrant arts scene, beachy atmosphere and burgeoning food culture.
How much is a new manufactured home in Sarasota, Florida?
How much is a new manufactured home in Sarasota, Florida?
The cost of our quality-built manufactured homes varies. We offer many
affordable homes
with access to complimentary community amenities for added value. Please contact our team for pricing and more information.
What recreational activities are offered at Bahia Vista Estates?
What recreational activities are offered at Bahia Vista Estates?
Bahia Vista Estates features a heated swimming pool, fitness center, game area, shuffleboard, pickleball, bingo, walking trails, dog park and a clubhouse. Enjoy fantastic
amenities
in your new home.
What are the best attractions in Sarasota, Florida?
What are the best attractions in Sarasota, Florida?
Close to the city's educational, entertainment, and cultural venues in the coastal Florida region, Bahia Vista Estates is an incredible community. Enjoy Lido Beach, Siesta Key Beach, and explore aquatic life at the Mote Marine Laboratory.

"I have lived here for 12 years because we love it here. We have other family that have bought in the park along with friends. There is nothing like it in Sarasota, FL!"
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"I have recommended Bahia Vista Estates to my friends who are looking for a place to live."
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"Lovely place to live. Great amenities, well appointed lawns, pride of ownership. Communication with management is good. Very pleased to be able to live and be retired here."
Don’t Take it From Us. Hear From our Residents.
"[The office] team is the reason for your high score. They are always pleasant & helpful."

Bahia Vista Estates - Amenities and Activities
Bahia Vista Estates - Amenities and Activities
55+ Retirement Community in Sarasota, Florida
Live your best retirement life at Bahia Vista Estates. Our premier 55+ community in Sarasota, Florida, offers a friendly neighborhood vibe and outstanding amenities for a social and active 55+ lifestyle. Nestled in one of the most beautiful cities in the Sunshine State, our community boasts abundant recreational activities and experiences, including an outdoor pool and a clubhouse with planned social events. Challenge friends to shuffleboard, or enjoy aqua aerobics in the outdoor pool.
Clubhouse
Socialize with friends at the clubhouse, the social hub of our community, during events and activities. Play darts, billiards, and cards, or grab a book at the library.
Swimming Pool
Swim or join aqua aerobics in our sparkling outdoor pool. Cool off or just relax poolside in this oasis.
Fitness Center
Get energized in our fitness center with cardio and strength training equipment for workouts any time.
Dog Park
Let your furry friends run and play off-leash in our enclosed dog park in our pet friendly community.
Pickleball
Get active and challenge your new friends to a game of pickleball on our courts - perfect for fitness and socializing.
All Amenities
Beautiful homes, fun activities, and plenty of amenities makes Bahia Vista the finest manufactured home community on Florida's west coast of Florida. Live your next best chapter your way.

Bahia Vista Estates
Discover
Bahia Vista Estates is located in Sarasota - one of the most beautiful cities on the west coast of Florida. Our community offers easy access to exciting educational, entertainment and cultural attractions in the coastal Florida region. Get cultured at the Ringling Museum of Art, or explore aquatic lifeforms at the Mote Marine Laboratory. See a show at the Van Wenzel Performing Arts Center and play in the sunshine at Lido Beach, Siesta Key Beach, and Ringling Bridge Causeway Park. Explore nearby attractions  shopping, dining, and the arts. There is something for everybody in Sarasota.

FAQ Contact Us
Is Sarasota, Florida, a good place to live?
Is Sarasota, Florida, a good place to live?
Nestled south of Tampa on Florida’s Gulf Coast, Sarasota has a distinct vibe that's different from Florida's relative coastal cities, with its own vibrant arts scene, beachy atmosphere and burgeoning food culture.
How much is a new manufactured home in Sarasota, Florida?
How much is a new manufactured home in Sarasota, Florida?
The cost of our quality-built manufactured homes varies. We offer many
affordable homes
with access to complimentary community amenities for added value. Please contact our team for pricing and more information.
What recreational activities are offered at Bahia Vista Estates?
What recreational activities are offered at Bahia Vista Estates?
Bahia Vista Estates features a heated swimming pool, fitness center, game area, shuffleboard, pickleball, bingo, walking trails, dog park and a clubhouse. Enjoy fantastic
amenities
in your new home.
What are the best attractions in Sarasota, Florida?
What are the best attractions in Sarasota, Florida?
Close to the city's educational, entertainment, and cultural venues in the coastal Florida region, Bahia Vista Estates is an incredible community. Enjoy Lido Beach, Siesta Key Beach, and explore aquatic life at the Mote Marine Laboratory.
